attributes.additional_details:
On the occasion of the death or abdication of HM Queen Elizabeth II a referendum is held on the question that any person should succeed Her Majesty as Sovereign and Head of State.



The questions are—

1.
DO YOU AGREE THAT ON THE DEATH OR ABDICATION OF HER MAJESTY QUEEN ELIZABETH NO-ONE SHOULD SUCCEED HER AS SOVEREIGN AND HEAD OF STATE, AND THAT FUTURE HEADS OF STATE OF THE UNITED
KINGDOM SHOULD BE ELECTED?


  YES

  NO


2.
IF FUTURE HEADS OF STATE OF THIS COUNTRY WERE TO ELECTED, DO YOU THINK THAT THEY SHOULD BE ELECTED BY—


  A. MEMBERS OF BOTH HOUSES OF PARLIAMENT?


     OR


  B. POPULAR VOTE?’.







Thank you.
